title: Design and Application of Machine Learning Hardware Accelerators

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic machine learning concepts, programming experience, and basic knowledge of hardware architecture
context.additional_context: Participants are teachers or pre-service teachers interested in developing corporate education/training programs. They require an understanding of technology trends applicable to educational settings through real-case analysis.

learning_goals: Explain the design principles of machine learning hardware accelerators based on CNN, RNN, and ANN
Analyze performance metrics of hardware accelerators, including speed, power efficiency, and throughput
Propose machine learning hardware optimization strategies based on real-world applications
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
